mapper.select: SELECT * FROM FV_FREEZEMONTH WHERE ID = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT * FROM FV_FREEZEMONTH WHERE ID = #{param.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT t.* FROM (SELECT tt.*, ROWNUM AS ROWNO FROM (SELECT b.CODE TERMINAL_CODE, a.*
ORDER BY a.CREATE_TIME DESC) tt WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end, jdbcType=INTEGER}) t WHERE t.ROWNO >= #{start, jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT a.* FROM FV_FREEZEMONTH a order by a.CREATE_TIME desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FV_FREEZEMONTH (ID, SAMPLE_TIME, ASSEMBLE_TOTALS, FORWARD_HAS, FORWARD_NO, REVERSE_HAS, REVERSE_NO, TOTALS, FORWARD_HAS_MONTH, FORWARD_NO_MONTH, REVERSE_HAS_MONTH, REVERSE_NO_MONTH, PEAK_TOTALS, FLAT_TOTALS, VALLEY_TOTALS, TIP_TOTALS, MORNING_TOTALS, MIDDAY_TOTALS, NIGHT_TOTALS, TERMINAL_ID, VERSION, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, REMARKS) VALUES (#{param.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.sampleTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{param.assembleTotals, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.forwardHas, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.forwardNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.reverseHas, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.reverseNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.totals, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.forwardHasMonth, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.forwardNoMonth, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.reverseHasMonth, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.reverseNoMonth, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.peakTotals, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.flatTotals, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.valleyTotals, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.tipTotals, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.morningTotals, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.middayTotals, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.nightTotals, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.terminalId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.version, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{param.createBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.remarks, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

INSERT INTO FV_FREEZEMONTH (ID, SAMPLE_TIME, ASSEMBLE_TOTALS, FORWARD_HAS, FORWARD_NO, REVERSE_HAS, REVERSE_NO, TOTALS, FORWARD_HAS_MONTH, FORWARD_NO_MONTH, REVERSE_HAS_MONTH, REVERSE_NO_MONTH, PEAK_TOTALS, FLAT_TOTALS, VALLEY_TOTALS, TIP_TOTALS, MORNING_TOTALS, MIDDAY_TOTALS, NIGHT_TOTALS, TERMINAL_ID, VERSION, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, REMARKS)
select #{param.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.sampleTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{param.assembleTotals, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.forwardHas, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.forwardNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.reverseHas, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.reverseNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.totals, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.forwardHasMonth, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.forwardNoMonth, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.reverseHasMonth, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.reverseNoMonth, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.peakTotals, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.flatTotals, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.valleyTotals, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.tipTotals, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.morningTotals, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.middayTotals, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.nightTotals, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.terminalId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.version, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param.createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{param.createBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.remarks, jdbcType=VARCHAR} from dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE FV_FREEZEMONTH a
a.SAMPLE_TIME = #{param.sampleTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
a.ASSEMBLE_TOTALS = #{param.assembleTotals, jdbcType=INTEGER},
a.FORWARD_HAS = #{param.forwardHas, jdbcType=INTEGER},
a.FORWARD_NO = #{param.forwardNo, jdbcType=INTEGER},
a.REVERSE_HAS = #{param.reverseHas, jdbcType=INTEGER},
a.REVERSE_NO = #{param.reverseNo, jdbcType=INTEGER},
a.TOTALS = #{param.totals, jdbcType=INTEGER},
a.FORWARD_HAS_MONTH = #{param.forwardHasMonth, jdbcType=INTEGER},
a.FORWARD_NO_MONTH = #{param.forwardNoMonth, jdbcType=INTEGER},
a.REVERSE_HAS_MONTH = #{param.reverseHasMonth, jdbcType=INTEGER},
a.REVERSE_NO_MONTH = #{param.reverseNoMonth, jdbcType=INTEGER},
a.PEAK_TOTALS = #{param.peakTotals, jdbcType=INTEGER},
a.FLAT_TOTALS = #{param.flatTotals, jdbcType=INTEGER},
a.VALLEY_TOTALS = #{param.valleyTotals, jdbcType=INTEGER},
a.TIP_TOTALS = #{param.tipTotals, jdbcType=INTEGER},
a.MORNING_TOTALS = #{param.morningTotals, jdbcType=INTEGER},
a.MIDDAY_TOTALS = #{param.middayTotals, jdbcType=INTEGER},
a.NIGHT_TOTALS = #{param.nightTotals, jdbcType=INTEGER},
a.TERMINAL_ID = #{param.terminalId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
a.UPDATE_TIME = #{param.updateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, a.UPDATE_BY = #{param.updateBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
WHERE a.ID = #{param.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete FROM FV_FREEZEMONTH a where a.ID = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
delete FROM FV_FREEZEMONTH a where a.ID = #{param.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
